updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #Bishan to #Sembawang have resumed.
[NSL]UPDATE:Fault cleared, trains are progressively returning to normal speed. Pls add 10mins travel time from #Bishan to #Sembawang.
[NSL] UPDATE: Pls cater 15 mins additional travel time from #Bishan to #Sembawang. We are working to recover service.
[NSL]UPDATE:Due to a signalling fault at #Sembawang.Pls add 15mins travel time from #Bishan to #Sembawang.Train svc is still available.
[NSL] UPDATE: Pls cater 15 mins additional travel time from #Bishan towards #Sembawang. We are working to recover service.
[NSL]UPDATE:Pls add 15mins travel time from #Bishan towards #Sembawang,due to a signalling fault at #Sembawang.Train svc is still available.
[NSL]: Due to a signalling fault,pls add 15mins travel time from#Bishan to #Sembawang towards #JurongEast.Train service is still available.
